title: AccessLens Persona Schema
description: Abstract dimensions representing non-financial access frictions in benefit delivery systems. These dimensions describe conditions, not inherent capabilities or eligibility.

information_awareness_level.description: Represents the level of knowledge about scheme entitlements, eligibility criteria, and application processes.

documentation_completeness.description: Represents the current status of required identity and supporting documents relative to administrative mandates.

digital_access_quality.description: Represents the reliability and availability of digital infrastructure (device, detailed connectivity, literacy) needed for access.

biometric_authentication_status.description: Represents the historical consistency and success rate of biometric verification attempts.

mobility_and_distance_constraint.description: Represents physical and logistical barriers related to travel distance and transport availability.

local_institutional_support.description: Represents the responsiveness and helpfulness of local intermediaries and administrative officials.

grievance_navigation_agency.description: Represents the ability to independently understand and navigate grievance redressal mechanisms.

language_and_communication_barrier.description: Represents the linguistic and communication gap between the individual and official administrative channels.
